name: Kascommissie
description: Audit committee responsible for financial oversight, reviewing accounting practices, ensuring compliance with financial regulations, and providing independent financial audit services for the association. Members automatically receive the 'Verenigingen Auditor' role profile for read-only financial access.
objectives:
The Kascommissie (Audit Committee) provides independent oversight of the association's financial operations, ensuring:

  • Accuracy and completeness of financial records
  • Compliance with accounting standards and regulations
  • Proper internal controls and risk management
  • Independent review of financial statements
  • Oversight of external audit processes
  • Detection and prevention of financial irregularities

Automatic Role Assignment: Team members automatically receive the 'Verenigingen Auditor' role profile, providing read-only access to financial data and volunteer participation capabilities.

key_responsibilities.responsibility: Review monthly financial statements and accounting records
Audit SEPA direct debit processes and mandate compliance
Verify membership dues collection and payment processing
Review expense claims and volunteer expense reimbursements
Monitor banking transactions and reconciliation processes
Assess compliance with financial regulations and internal policies
Prepare audit reports and recommendations for board review
Coordinate with external auditors when required
